message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you this great product. I'm asking for $22,000 to start. I know it's top-of-the-line and you'll be thrilled with the value it brings.
I appreciate the offer, but I'm not sure I can go that high. I was thinking more along the lines of $12,000. Can we meet in the middle?
Thanks for the offer, Bob.  I understand your perspective, but this product really is exceptional and in high demand.  How about we meet at $19,000? I'm confident you won't be disappointed.
I appreciate your confidence in the product, but I'm still not comfortable with the price. I'm willing to meet you halfway between $12,000 and $19,000, so how about $15,500?
